attributes.action: STOPinterest being put on inheritence tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
parents or last parent dies.
have to pay inheritence tax,within 6 months,because you have not got the money to pay for the inheritence tax until a property is sold to enable you to have the money.
then because you have not paid by the due date the H.M.R.C,then charges you interest of 5% aday on top of the inheritence,until you pay the due amount,ant interest,this is double taxing that parents already paid tax on when they brought the property,then makes more profit by adding interest,when is this going to STOP ?
NOT ALL SIBLINGS OF PARENTS WHO DIED ARE WELL OFF,LIKE ME,I'M DISABLED,AND HAVE 4 CHILDREN,AND HUSBAND ON MIMIMAL WAGE,HOW CAN I FIND JUST UNDER 48,000-00,TO PAY THE INHERITENCE TAX,ONLY IF I WAS WEALTHY.
